activities:
We receive personal information from:

- our customers - publishers/operators of mobile applications
- the mobile users of our customers - consumers using mobile applications

We allow all our customers and their mobile users:

- access to the personal information we store about them by emailing us at privacy@leanplum.com and requesting it
- updates of the personally identifiable information we store about them by emailing us at privacy@leanplum.com and requesting it
- deletion of the personally identifiable information we store about them by emailing us at privacy@leanplum.com and requesting it

We have implemented internal procedures for securing prompt reaction and diligent handling of personal information requests from our customers and their mobile users.

Our commercial contracts do NOT allow us to resell or provide personally identifiable information to 3rd parties - we can only do that with aggregated data in an anonymized form.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Automatic collection, recording, organization, storage, adaptation, combination, retrieval, and use of client and user data. No manually processed data.
